description: Will Braun is looking to be a houseboy so he shows up to the house to see if there are any openings. Bennett Anthony is the maintenance man in charge of the home, but knowing no one is around he decides to cool off with a swim. Will catches him in the pool and Bennett plays slick by telling him he’s the owner. He proceeds to show Will just where the opening is. The two exchange hot blowjobs before Will fucks Bennett’s hole.
title: The Real Houseboys Of West Hollywood Part 2
